meanings.definition: A medical doctor specializing in the diagnosis and treatment of diseases and disorders of the urinary tract and male reproductive system.
meanings.sent1: The urologists at the hospital helped treat patients with kidney problems.
meanings.sent2: My uncle had to visit the urologists for his prostate check-up.
meanings.sent3: The urologists joked that they were experts in 'plumbing' issues of the body.
meanings.sent4: To the urologists, the urinary system was like a complex puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The urologists' dedication to their patients' well-being was truly admirable.
